snippet: A report from A.D.P. on hiring, and one from the Conference Board on consumer confidence, encouraged investors before Friday’s jobs numbers from the Labor Department.
abstract: Stock market moves solidly higher, with Standard & Poor's 500-stock index seeing its best day in seven weeks, as bullish reports on consumer confidence and private sector jobs encourage investors.
lead_paragraph: A report from A.D.P. on hiring, and one from the Conference Board on consumer confidence, encouraged investors before Friday’s jobs numbers from the Labor Department.

headline.seo: Reports on Jobs and Consumer Confidence Lift Stock Market
headline.main: Market Lifted by Reports on Jobs and Consumers
headline.print_headline: Market Lifted by Reports On Jobs and Consumers
